name: Summer Games (itch)
description:
What you get when you study in GRM Academy?
If we make a game: A name or nickname of your choice for the game credits and website. Commissions will be negotiated before the start of the project and depends on project. At the end of the study period promotion to a GRM Team
Join now https://discord.gg/cZzaxXB

These Summer Games minigames are developed by students of the GRM Academy. GRM is an indie development team and community, making games and software for the PC and Mobile platforms www.gamerealmmadness.com
